abstracts.cdata!:
The National Program Support for Basic
            Education Project aims to improve quality and equity in
            learning outcomes for all Filipinos in basic education. The
            closing date for the project will be extended from December
            31, 2011 to December 31, 2012. The extension is necessary to
            allow the department of education to complete the
            procurement and delivery of the English, Mathematics, and
            Science and Technology textbooks to be financed under the
            project. The implementing agency, the Department of
            Education, has prepared an action plan as well as a revised
            procurement plan and disbursement schedule to complete the
            project. This will be the first extension of the project.
